doc.field: UniversPt_Type: District of Columbia GIS Datasets (Datastack)

This collection (stacked series) of datasets is provided to the UVA Library’s Scholars’ Lab by DC Geographic Information Systems (DC GIS), which is a division of the Office of the Chief Technology Officer (OCTO). The data are managed and maintained by OCTO and the DC GIS Steering Committee (GISSC) and are provided AS-IS with no guarantee of their completeness, accuracy or content. The data pertain primarily to the infrastructure within the District of Columbia as well as natural features and Census information.
* // * The temporal extent of the datasets in the datastack is generally in the 2006-2008 range. Some Census data are also available from 1930 to 2000. * // * Datasets/Layers included in this datastack (with non-exclusive list of included attributes): * Alcoholic Beverage licence locations * DC Addresses * Air Emissions test points * Air space rights * Air space restrictions * Alley locations * Outpatient medical care centers * Advisory Neighborhood Commission Board of Elections 1990 * Advisory Neighborhood Commission Board of Elections 2002 * Architect of the Capitol building locations * Appropriations polygons * Assessment Neighborhoods * Assessment Sub-Neighborhoods * Above Ground Storage Tanks * Bank Locations * Bicycle Lanes * Business Improvement Districts * Buildings (incl: names, descriptions) * Bridges (incl: names, descriptions) * Bridges and Tunnels * Bus Rapid Transit Lines * Building Restrictions * CAMA Commerical property characteristics * CAMA Condominium property characteristics * CAMA Residential property characteristics * Cemeteries (incl: name, address, lot size) * Certificate of Occupancy holders * Commission of Fine Arts review areas * Commuter Bus Locations * Comprehensive Plan Planning Areas * Cultural Features locations * Child Care Centers * Collaborative Areas (of family support) boundaries * Community Gardens locations * Census Block Groups (incl: population, demographic and socioeconomic information for 2000 and 2004) * GIS topography (contour lines - 1m, 5m, 10m) * DC city limits * DC public property locations * DC Quadrant boundaries * Dialysis clinic locations * District Revitalization Areas * Downtown Development Comprehensive Plan boundaries * Economic Development Zones * Electric Substation locations * Elementary School Zone boundaries (incl: school name, area) * Energy Star participating business locations * Fire station locations * Flood Plains * Gas Station locations * Hazardous Waste locations * Historic District boundaries * Historic Structures locations (incl: name) * Historic Streets (polyline and polygon) * Hospital locations (incl: type) * Historically Underutilized Businesses Zones * Hydrography * Hydrography centerlines * Landmark Buildings and Structures (incl: names) * Landmark Areas * Land Use (incl: land use category) * Leadership in Energy and Environmental Design (LEED) sites * L'Enfant Plan boundaries * Metro Station Entrance locations for the full WMATA system *Metro Station Entrance locations within DC * Metro Entrance structures * Metro lines for the full WMATA system * Metro lines within the DC boundaries * Metro service areas * Misc structures (planters, statues, benches, etc) * Misc transportation features (ramps, rails, guardrails, etc) * Middle School Zone boundaries (incl: school name, area) * Neighborhood Cluster boundaries * Neighborhood Composition (incl: socio-economic status) * Other Bus lines (routes supplemental to the WMATA) * Owner points * Parcel Lots boundaries * Park and Ride Lot locations * Planned Land Use 2006 (incl: zoning type) * Public School Locations * Public School property boundaries * Railroad lines * Recreational Facility locations and boundaries (incl: type) * Reservations * Roads * Roof top elevations * Shaw Neighborhood Historical Sites (incl: name) * Sewer structures and locations (incl: type) * Senior High School Zone boundaries (incl: school name, area) * Sidewalks * Signed Bike Routes * Single Member Districts 2002 * Spot elevation (topo points) * Street centerlines * Street segments * Structure lines (walls, fences, etc) * Structure polygons (stairs, etc) * Transportation Analysis Zone boundaries (incl: population) * Technology Zone boundaries * Trees * University locations and property boundaries (incl: name, address) * Utility Pole locations (incl: type) * Voter Precincts for 1990, 2000, and 2002 * Waterbody boundaries (incl: type) * Watershed boundaries * Wetland boundaries * Wooded Area boundaries * Zip code boundaries * Zoning (incl: summary information, zoning codes and code descriptions) * // * These data were made available to the University of Virginia for educational and research uses only. Access is restricted to students, faculty and staff of the University of Virginia.
